scripts.publish: git init && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m 'rebuilt' && git remote add origin https://github.com/krawaller/csharp-ht2017-solutions.git && git push -f origin gh-pages && rm -rf .git
scripts.pubci: cd H_circleci && git init && git add . && git commit -m 'rebuilt' && git remote add origin https://github.com/krawaller/testcircleci.git && git push -f origin master && rm -rf .git
